item.title: Paramount launches rival bid for Warner Bros Discovery
item.description: The Hollywood battle to buy Warner Bros Discovery is shaping up to be a blockbuster.

item.title: Three-year-old girl killed in Gaza by Israeli forces, local sources say
item.description: Israel says it is unaware of a strike, but is investigating the reported death of the child in southern Gaza.

item.title: About 100 abducted schoolchildren released in Nigeria
item.description: Details of the release of the schoolchildren are still unclear and 165 people remain unaccounted for.

item.title: Critical moment to ramp up support for Ukraine, European allies say
item.description: Volodymyr Zelensky and the leaders of France, Germany and the UK held talks in London to discuss the latest US efforts to end the war in Ukraine.

item.title: US Supreme Court appears poised to expand Trump's power to fire federal officials
item.description: Trump v Slaughter, heard by the top court on Monday, is a case that could have major implications for the independence of some federal agencies.
